content: Get quick professional help for all the issues you face.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the support offered by a professional service. It will be displayed as part of a banner or benefits section in the UI, providing users with an overview of the assistance they can expect when upgrading to a pro plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Qarşılaşdığınız hər hansı bir çətinlik üçün sürətli peşəkar yardımdan yararlanın' is a bit literal and doesn't capture the nuance of 'Get quick professional help for all the issues you face.' It implies 'benefit from' quick help rather than 'receive' or 'access' it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like: "Təcili peşəkar dəstək alın, qarşılaşdığınız bütün problemlərə görə." (Get urgent professional support for all the problems you face.) or "Bütün problemlərinizə görə sürətli peşəkar dəstəyə daxil olun." (Access quick professional support for all your problems.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Erhalten Sie den professionellen Support bei allen Schwierigkeiten' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in German. 'Support' is also anglicized and a more common German term would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Erhalten Sie professionelle Unterstützung bei allen Problemen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content uses 'issues', while the German translation uses 'Schwierigkeiten'. While both can mean issues, 'Probleme' would be a more common and direct translation in this context, especially when offering support.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Erhalten Sie professionelle Unterstützung bei allen Problemen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ստացեք արագ մասնագիտական օգնություն ձեր առջև ծառացած բոլոր խնդիրների համար:" while grammatically correct, is a very literal translation. A more natural and idiomatic Armenian translation would convey the meaning of "professional help for all the issues you face" more effectively. The current phrasing sounds somewhat formal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like: "Ամրացրեք ձեր խնդիրներին մասնագիտական օգնության հասանելիությունը:" or "Միջոցեք ձեզ մասնագիտական օգնություն, եթե ունեք ցանկացած հարցում:" (These are just examples and might require further refinement based on the specific context.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເຈົ້າ' is used. While not strictly incorrect, it's more formal to use 'ທ່ານ' in a professional context like a support banner.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຂໍຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອແບບມືອາຊີບດ່ວນສຳລັບທຸກບັນຫາທີ່ທ່ານປະເຊີນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Get quick professional help for all the issues you face' is a bit more conversational and emphasizes immediacy. The Portuguese translation 'Obtenha rapidamente ajuda profissional para todos os problemas com que se deparar' is technically correct but slightly more formal and verbose. A more natural-sounding translation, keeping the tone closer to the original, might be 'Receba ajuda profissional rápida para resolver todos os seus problemas.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Receba ajuda profissional rápida para resolver todos os seus problemas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Obtenha' which is more formal than 'Receba' or 'Consiga' which would be more appropriate for a promotional banner.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Receba ajuda profissional rápida para todos os problemas que você enfrenta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Получайте профессиональную помощь по всем возникшим вопросам' while generally conveying the meaning, is a bit literal and lacks the immediacy and directness of the original 'Get quick professional help for all the issues you face.' It sounds slightly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Получите быструю профессиональную помощь для решения ваших вопросов.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබ මුහුණ දෙන සියළුම ගැටළු සඳහා ඉක්මනින් සහාය ගන්න' doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Get quick professional help for all the issues you face'. The English implies professional assistance, while the Sinhala simply says 'get help'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ මුහුණ දෙන සියළුම ගැටළු සඳහා වෘත්තීයමය සහාය ඉක්මනින් ලබා ගන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content 'issues' is translated as 'otázky, ktoré sa vám môžu vyskytnúť' which is more like 'questions that may arise'. 'Issues' in this context refers to problems or difficulties, not just questions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Získajte rýchlu odbornú pomoc pri všetkých problémoch, s ktorými sa stretnete.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Poiščite hitro strokovno pomoč za vse težave, s katerimi se srečujete" leans towards 'find' or 'seek' professional help. The original English emphasizes 'get' implying access or provision of help. A more accurate translation would convey the sense of receiving help, not just finding it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prejemite hitro strokovno pomoč za vse težave, s katerimi se srečujete.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Get quick professional help for all the issues you face' implies a proactive offering of assistance. The Serbian translation 'Dobijte brzu profesionalnu pomoć za sve probleme sa kojima se suočavate' is more accurately translated as 'Receive quick professional help for all the problems you face.' The English conveys a service offered, while the Serbian feels more like a reactive response.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dobijte brzu profesionalnu pomoć za sve izazove koje imate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Get quick professional help for all the issues you face" is more accurately conveyed as 'Receive/Obtain professional help to resolve any issues you encounter'.  The current translation, '解决你的任何问题' (solve your any problem), feels slightly clunky and doesn't quite capture the 'help' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 获得专业的帮助，解决您遇到的任何问题 (Huòdé zhuānyè de bāngzhù, jiějué nín yùdào de rènhé wèntí)
